Text: Anyone else has problem with sound? Works normally until 0:42:00, and then sound disappears altogether.

I have the same problem. It's such a shame, such wonderful production. Has anyone discovered a work around? 

I've tried dozen's of players and codec, but the sublime music always abandons me at 0:42:00
Please, cbrace upload an correct version! The sound stop after 42 minutes!

Anybody knows of a opera-specific site?
Thanks
Thanks for the effort "cbrace" but you have downloaded a incomplete copy of the Opera. At first I thought my equipment was faulty, but not so.
